versos: (saul) 1 Samuel 10:1 - "Then Samuel took a flask of oil and poured it on Sauls head and kissed him, saying, 'Has not the Lord anointed you ruler over his inheritance'";;;
(vulgar) There is no Bible verse that explicitly contains the word "vulgar.";;;
(kedar) Isaiah 21:16 - "For this is what the Lord said to me: 'Within one year, as a servant bound by contract would count it, all the pomp of kedar will come to an end.'";;;
(towns) Luke 10:1 - After this the Lord appointed seventy-two others and sent them two by two ahead of him to every town and place where he was about to go.;;;
(castles) Ezekiel 26:10 - His horses will be so many that they will cover you with dust. Your walls will shake at the noise of the war horses
(padan) Genesis 31:18 - "and he drove all his livestock ahead of him, including all the livestock he had gotten in Paddan Aram.";;;
(stronger) 1 John 4:4 - "You, dear children, are from God and have overcome them, because the one who is in you is greater than the one who is in the world.";;;
(twins) Genesis 25:24 - "When the time came for her to give birth, there were twin boys in her womb.";;;

(red) Isaiah 1:18 - "Come now, let us settle the matter," says the Lord. "Though your sins are like scarlet, they shall be as white as snow; though they are red as crimson, they shall be like wool.";;;
(cunning) Proverbs 12:16 - Fools show their annoyance at once
(venison) Genesis 27:3 - "Now therefore take, I pray thee, thy weapons, thy quiver and thy bow, and go out to the field, and take me some venison;";;;
(faint) Psalm 27:13 - "I believe that I shall look upon the goodness of the Lord in the land of the living";;;
(feed) Proverbs 22:9 - "The generous will themselves be blessed, for they share their food with the poor.";;;
(edom) Obadiah 1:1 - "The vision of Obadiah. Thus says the Lord God concerning edom:";;;
(sold) Genesis 37:28 - So when the Midianite traders passed by
(beside) Psalm 23:2 - "He makes me lie down in green pastures, he leads me beside quiet waters,";;;
(dew) Psalm 133:3 - "It is as if the dew of Hermon were falling on Mount Zion. For there the Lord bestows his blessing, even life forevermore.";;;
